/* 맴버쉽 목록 전체 조회 */
SELECT M.MEMBERSHIP_KEY AS MEMBERSHIP_KEY , IFNULL(CM.MESSAGE, M.MEMBERSHIP_NAME) AS MEMBERSHIP_NAME FROM MEMBERSHIP M LEFT JOIN COUNTRY_MESSAGE CM ON CM.MESSAGE_ID = M.MEMBERSHIP_MESSAGE AND CM.COUNTRY_CODE = #{locale} AND CM.MESSAGE_ID IN ( SELECT MG.MESSAGE_ID FROM MESSAGE_GROUP MG WHERE MG.USE_YN <> 0 )
mapper.insert: /* 맴버쉽 신규 생성 */ INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP ( MEMBERSHIP_MESSAGE, MEMBERSHIP_NAME, LVL_CODE, USE_YN, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{vo.membershipMessage}, #{vo.membershipName}, #{vo.lvlCode}, #{vo.useYn}, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select: /* 매핑된 포럼 목록 조회 */ SELECT MFM.CATEGORY_ID , MFM.FORUM_KEY FROM MEMBERSHIP_FORUM_MAPPER MFM INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_ID = MFM.CATEGORY_ID AND MFM.MEMBERSHIP_KEY = #{membershipKey} AND C.USE_YN <> 0 INNER JOIN FORUM F ON F.FORUM_KEY = MFM.FORUM_KEY AND F.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID AND F.USE_YN <> 0
mapper.insert: /* 매핑 신규 등록 */ INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP_FORUM_MAPPER ( MEMBERSHIP_KEY, CATEGORY_ID, FORUM_KEY, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{vo.membershipKey}, #{vo.categoryId}, #{vo.forumKey}, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
